page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KAREN
page.content: At ten to eight the day starts for me.I get dressed then go into the bathroom.I have a wash and brush my teeth then I have my breakfast.I have a mug of coffee and a slice of toast.Then I get my bag and go to school.I play netball in the school playground before I go into school because I have plenty of time.The first lesson is sometimes comprehension and at twenty to eleven we have break and then its maths.At twelve o'clock we have our dinner and start the next lesson at quarter past one which is sometimes art.In between we have another break and then at half past three i go home,have a drink and watch television.At half past five I have my tea.
